titleStmt.title: Tristitiæ Christianæ: or An ocean of pious tears. An elegy upon the death of the reverend, pious, and learned minister of the gospel, Mr. Matthew Mead, who departed this life at his dwelling-house in Stepney, on Monday, the 16th day of this instant October, 1699. In the sixty ninth year of his age. / Written by a constant auditor, and sorrowful mourner, for the loss of this reverend deceased pastor.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by J. Bradford, in Little Britain, over against the Pump.,
